Name: Bouncy Cloud
About the game: In this challenging 2D arcade, you have one goal, capture the flag(s). Play through 20 plus levels to master your craft of the bounce, as you can only control your lateral movement and you will need to use the platforms to bounce to your goal. Test your skills in the Circuit, a 10 level challenge where you will need to capture the flag and collect stars to earn points. See how your score stacks up against your friends and other players as you climb the Leaderboards. - Steam Leaderboards - Precision Platforming - 24 Levels to master
Meta Title: Bouncy Cloud: Jul 27, 2021, Talal Nweiran and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Bouncy Cloud? Check out the release date (Jul 27, 2021), developer insights from Talal Nweiran, and a complete game summary.
